LoginForm.Register: I'm not registered yet, sign up!
LoginForm.RememberPassWord: I have forgotten my password, remind me!
LoginForm.Title: Information system - WebCross

RegisterForm.FinishOkBody: El proceso de registro ha finalizado con éxito. Ahora podrá ingresar al sistema con los datos registrados.

PasswordChageForm.TitleP1: We'll send a email to account registred
PasswordChageForm.TitleP2: with the instrucctions to change access data
PasswordChageForm.MessageOkBody: In a few seconds you will receive an email with the instructions to change the access credentials to our system. The access token for password change (included in the email) will last 15 minutes. Don't forget to check your span tray in case this is the first time you are doing this process.

PasswordChangeNewForm.Title: Register the new password information with which you will enter our system

PasswordChangeNewUpdated.MessageErrorBody: El token de validación ha expirado o no es válido. No se ha podido validar identidad del usuario. Por favor inicie el proceso nuevamente.
PasswordChangeNewUpdated.MessageOkBody: Se han actualizado sus credenciales de acceso. Ahora podrá ingresar a nuestro sistema con éstos nuevos datos
